subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in k8s-cluster (eu-west-1)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical infrastructure issue in k8s-cluster (eu-west-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The k8s-cluster in the eu-west-1 region is experiencing critical resource constraints, with CPU utilization at 93.78% and memory utilization at 97.61%. This high resource utilization is likely due to an increased workload or insufficient resource allocation. As a result, all workloads running within the cluster are impacted, leading to degraded performance, increased latency, or potential service outages for customers. The issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: k8s-cluster
Region: eu-west-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: infrastructure

Metrics:
{
  "cpu_percent": 93.78,
  "memory_percent": 97.61,
  "disk_io_mbps": 141.01,
  "network_io_mbps": 743.92
}

Workaround: Scale up resources for the k8s-cluster or optimize workloads to reduce CPU and memory usage. Additionally, investigate the cause of increased disk I/O (141.01 MBps) and network I/O (743.92 MBps) to further alleviate resource constraints.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

extracted_fields.impact: All workloads running within the cluster are impacted, leading to degraded performance and potential service outages.
extracted_fields.requested_action: Immediate attention to resolve resource constraints.

merged_extracted_fields.impact: All workloads running within the cluster are impacted, leading to degraded performance and potential service outages.
merged_extracted_fields.requested_action: Immediate attention to resolve resource constraints.

current_triage.rationale: The ticket describes a critical infrastructure issue with high resource utilization impacting all workloads, leading to degraded performance and potential service outages.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to outage classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
